full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 755 Filed 08/10/22 Page 29 of 262 1734 LC8VMAX2 Gill Velez - direct 1 generated? 2 A. New-hire paperwork. 3 Q. What sorts of new-hire paperwork? 4 A. It would be application, policies and procedures handbook, personnel action notices. 5 6 Q. You mentioned a personnel action notice. What is a personnel action notice? 7 8 A. That would be the document that the manager would complete to bring the person onboard. It would state their position and pay rate. 9 10 11 Q. And what happens after the personnel action notice is created? 12 13 A. It's submitted to human resources and payroll for processing. 14 15 Q. Who, if anyone else, reviews the personnel action notice? 16 17 A. It would be the manager, human resources, payroll, and the managing director. 18 19 Q. What sort of information is contained in a personnel action notice? 20 21 A. It would be the employee's name, date of birth, Social Security number, address, they'll put the position, and rate of pay. 22 23 Q. Is making a personnel action notice a regular practice of Mar-a-Lago? 24 25 A. Yes. SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00013307

1 generated? 2 A. New-hire paperwork. 3 Q. What sorts of new-hire paperwork? 4 A. It would be application, policies and procedures handbook, personnel action notices. 5 6 Q. You mentioned a personnel action notice. What is a personnel action notice? 7 8 A. That would be the document that the manager would complete to bring the person onboard. It would state their position and pay rate. 9 10 11 Q. And what happens after the personnel action notice is created? 12 13 A. It's submitted to human resources and payroll for processing. 14 15 Q. Who, if anyone else, reviews the personnel action notice? 16 17 A. It would be the manager, human resources, payroll, and the managing director. 18 19 Q. What sort of information is contained in a personnel action notice? 20 21 A. It would be the employee's name, date of birth, Social Security number, address, they'll put the position, and rate of pay. 22 23 Q. Is making a personnel action notice a regular practice of Mar-a-Lago? 24 25 A. Yes.
